archimate:WorkPackage.name: (question) Does EASA support 3D certification?
archimate:WorkPackage.documentation: It seems that they do. The problem is also that the tool and the certified content must live the whole life of the A/C + years after. Dassault Aviation explain in a presentation that they certified the 3D of the Falcon 7X in a perspective of migrating every 10 years the tool and digital 3D drawings and managing the deltas.
